attributes.action: Retain the 5year ILR route and delay access to public benefits until citizenship
attributes.additional_details: “Do not extend ILR to 10–15 years and require ILR holders to wait until citizenship for benefits.”
attributes.background: “Do not extend ILR to 10–15 years and require ILR holders to wait until citizenship for benefits.”

rejection.details: Keep 5-Year ILR and Restrict Access to Benefits for New ILR Holders: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/746363
